app_of_the_day.name: Perplexity AI
app_of_the_day.what: An AI-powered search engine that answers questions with cited sources in conversational format — no link lists, just answers.
app_of_the_day.why: When you need to research something fast, Perplexity cuts Google's 10-link scroll to a single sourced answer. Huge time saver for students and builders.
app_of_the_day.verdict: Replace your first Google search with this. Free tier is genuinely excellent.

health_tip: Drink a full glass of water before your first coffee. Rehydrates and cuts false hunger signals.

life_hack.tip: Write tomorrow's single most important task before you close your laptop. Eliminates morning decision fatigue completely.

money_tip.tip: Track every purchase for 30 days before trying to optimize anything. You can't cut what you haven't measured.
